key_usability_regular_use: I think I would use the website/app regularly.
key_usability_complicated: The website/app seems unnecessarily complicated to me.
key_usability_easy_to_use: I think the website/app is easy to use.
key_usability_need_support: I think I would need technical support to be able to use the website/app.
key_usability_well_integrated: I think that the various functions of the website/app are well integrated.
key_usability_inconsistent: The website/app seems too inconsistent to me.
key_usability_easy_learning: I believe that most people can quickly learn how to use the website/app.
key_usability_cumberstone: The website/app seems very cumbersome to use.
key_usability_confident: I feel very confident using the website/app
key_usability_learn_a_lot: I had to learn a lot to get to grips with the website/app.
key_stressful_mental_demand: How mentally demanding was the task?
key_stressful_physical_demand: How physically demanding was the task?
key_stressful_pace: How hurried or rushed was the pace of the task?
key_stressful_success: How successful were you in accomplishing what you were asked to do?
key_stressful_workload: How hard did you have to work to accomplish your level of performance?
key_stressful_emotions: How insecure, discouraged, irritated, stressed, and annoyed were you?
key_personal_technical_affinity: Technical Affinity (from 0=no affinity to 9 very tech affine)
